channel.title: Need port forwarding help
channel.description: Okay before you even think about saying "go read a tut" or some other bs. I have done everything. I'm an ex-server hoster. I don't know what happen but now my computer wont host.. well anything. I've tried port-forwarding through my router, through (micro)µtorrent, and even a mix of both. Nothing works, Pm me if you want to try and help through team viewer Will rep++ :)

item.title: Need port forwarding help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude462 sk8rdude462
item.description:
@sk8rdude462 wrote:

Soll ich Translate darauf antworten? oh warten lassen sagen, dass in DEUTSCH. weil ich es kann. warum? Ich lernte eine zweite Sprache. Habe ich lernen, die eine, die mehr populär ist. NO. auf Deutsch

Wait, you don’t need a translation I forgot.

Read full topic

item.title: Need port forwarding help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude462 sk8rdude462
item.description:
@sk8rdude462 wrote:

[quote=“Explisionist, post:20, topic:423507”][quote author=sk8rdude462 link=topic=526136.msg3831930#msg3831930 date=1322630767]

Why does reputation matter so much? It’s just a number based on your friends clicking the rep++ button… 0 rep or 200 rep either way it doesn’t determine intelligence…

Yeah 5$ says he’s the one that de-repped me lol. Anyways, can you help possibly?
[/quote]
Don’t make wager’s and pm me and I will see what I can do.

jaja eso es nada, no publique información si usted no puede hacerlo y luego dicen que no le importa ya no demuestras una falta de liderazgo en sí mismo es de extrañar que sus representantes están todavía bajo gl configurar su servidor, a continuación! nadie se va a ayudarle con esa actitud… BTW im quedarse pero te puede dejar!

haha that’s nothing, do not publish information if you can not do it and then say he does not care and do not show a lack of leadership in itself is surprising that their representatives are still under gl configuring your server, then! Nobody will help you with that attitude … BTW im gonna stay but you can leave!
^Bro don’t type in other languages to try and offend someone.[/quote]
Will do Explisionist… See if only ultimatepk knew how to be more respectful and not use a language translater to insult someone.

Read full topic

item.description:
@sk8rdude462 wrote:

whackatre:

I wish I didn’t link my bank account, then I would keep the negative $350 in my PP forever with nothing linked to me.

That’s just it… You have to link something. or your spending limit is $0. Hence why mines like that… But you can receive money all fine…

Read full topic

item.title: Need port forwarding help
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude462, post:7, topic:423507”][quote author=whackatre link=topic=526136.msg3831801#msg3831801 date=1322625804]

So you can’t host. Get someone else to host.

I hate doing that. I can never trust em. Last time I did like half my player files got deleted and the hoster changed sources w/o my knowledge… :S

Then get a VPS.

Buy for me pl0x?

PayPal balance: -$46.66 USD
[/quote]
Heres mine:
You’ve recently reached your spending limit. Add a credit card to increase your limits.
Recent transactions:
-None-
Balance : $13.00 USD

GF[/quote]

I wish I didn’t link my bank account, then I would keep the negative $350 in my PP forever with nothing linked to me.

Read full topic
